result.eng: There is a football match between An Spidéal and An Cheathrú Rua on at the park.
result.ga: tá cluiche peile idir an spidéal agus an cheathrú rua ar siúl ar an bpáirc
result.orig: tá cluiche peile idir an spidéal agus an cheathrú rua ar siúl ar an bpáirc
result.html: tá cluiche peile idir an spidéal agus an cheathrú rua ar siúl ar an bpáircThere is a football match between An Spidéal and An Cheathrú Rua on at the park.
result.ponchtml: tá cluiċe peile idir an spidéal agus an ċeaṫrú rua ar siúl ar an bpáircThere is a football match between An Spidéal and An Cheathrú Rua on at the park.

result.eng: I am leaving to go watch the football match now, bye.
result.ga: beidh mise ag imeacht le dul ag féachaint ar an gcluiche peile anois slán agaibh
result.orig: beidh mise ag imeacht le dul ag féachaint ar an gcluiche peile anois slán agaibh
result.html: beidh mise ag imeacht le dul ag féachaint ar an gcluiche peile anois slán agaibhI am leaving to go watch the football match now, bye.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ mise ag imeaċt le dul ag féaċaint ar an gcluiċe peile anois slán agaiḃI am leaving to go watch the football match now, bye.

result.eng: Would you like to go to the match?
result.ga: ar mhaith leat dul go dtí an cluiche
result.orig: ar mhaith leat dul go dtí an cluiche
result.html: ar mhaith leat dul go dtí an cluicheWould you like to go to the match?
result.ponchtml: ar ṁaiṫ leat dul go dtí an cluiċeWould you like to go to the match?
